name: <partner>
string:

 Oh, you did.<ask>

string:
…No? I thought

make Harry's
dream come true.
Well, you are a
girl. You must
have something
better to do…
What is it that
I want? Well, I
have time to
think about it.
Ha ha ha…
Let's go home.

name: <partner>
string:
My grandpa ran
a huge farm too.
I always wanted
to be like him.
But, now that I
have made my
dream come true
I don't know
what I really
want… What is
my dream? I've
got time to
think about it,
right? Well…
let's go home.

name: <partner>
string:
Yes, I used to
 have a dream

though… I
guess I have
time to think
about it…
Let's go home.

string:
